Package edu.uab.chattada.p5

Class CreditCardItem

java.lang.Object
edu.uab.chattada.p5.LockerItem
edu.uab.chattada.p5.CreditCardItem
public class CreditCardItem extends LockerItem
Subclass CreditCardItem that stores both confidential and non confidential credit card information
Author:
Chattada Viriyaphap <chattada@uab.edu>

  • Constructor Details

    • CreditCardItem

      public CreditCardItem(String name, String notes, int cardNumber01, int cardNumber02, int cardNumber03, int cardNumber04, int expireYear, int expireMonth, int expireDay, int cvv, int pin, int zipCode, int issuerPhone)
      Main method to create credit card info in ArrayList
      Parameters:
      name - - name of credit card's owner
      notes - - optional notes for credit card
      cardNumber01 - - first 4 digit of credit card number (16 total)
      cardNumber02 - - second 4 digit of credit card number (16 total)
      cardNumber03 - - third 4 digit of credit card number (16 total)
      cardNumber04 - - last 4 digit of credit card number (16 total)
      expireYear - - card expiration year
      expireMonth - - card expiration month
      expireDay - - card expiration day
      cvv - - security code on the back of credit card
      pin - - pin to access credit card
      zipCode - - zip code of credit card's owner's residence
      issuerPhone - - credit card's company phone number

    • getIssuerPhone

      public String getIssuerPhone()
      getIssuerPhone to get credit card's company phone number (used to activate, deactivate, or ask customer representatives some questions)
      Returns:
      String 10-digit credit card's company phone number

    • isValidName

      public boolean isValidName()
      isValidName to check if the credit card's owner's name is valid
      Returns:
      true if valid. false if invalid (i.e. null or "")

    • isValidCardNumber01

      public boolean isValidCardNumber01()
      isValidCardNumber01 to check if the first 4 digits of credit card number is valid
      Returns:
      true if valid. false if invalid (i.e. null or "" or does not contain 4-digit number)
